name: Dead End (itch) (TheRzeper)
description:
How to play:

WHEN YOU FIND A KEY, GO TO A CHEST AND PRESS "P"

Move with W S A D or arrows,

Shoot with right mouse click.

What is it about:

With your pet, you will need to find a key to a chest in randomly generated map where you might find some treasures and help or a lot of monsters which you will need to kill. Every 20 seconds, your pet would give you something to help you or to help it self. 

As you are always together with your pet, if you die, the game ends; if your pet dies, the game ends as well, which makes the game more complicated but interesting. 

Additional information:

All of the graphic and sound effects were made during game jam time period.

Music was taken from YouTube Studio (it's copyrighted free music).

Majority of the code was written with tutorials help, but I modified most of the code to make it more suitable for game. 

Game is mostly based on Binding Of Isaac (room generation idea) with some other ideas like following pet. 

Have fun while playing :)
